import styles from "./NewInvestmentForm.module.css" import { useState } from "react"; const NewInvestmentForm = props => { // states const [currentSavings, setCurrentSavings] = useState(''); // handlers const submitHandler = event => { event.preventDefault(); console.log('We submitted the form'); } const currentSavingsHandler = event => { setCurrentSavings(event.target.value); } return

} export default NewInvestmentForm;
